subject: Football
Gambling
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s opening week consists of 16 games, 13 with betting spreads of 4½ points or less and nine with spreads of 3 points or less.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s opening week consists of 16 games, 13 with betting spreads of 4½ points or less and nine with spreads of 3 points or less.
